mapper.select: select m.name, d.dept_name, p.job_name, t.process, t.subtitle, c.title from e_member m, e_dept d, e_position p, conf_topic t, conf_mng c where m.dept_id = d.dept_id and m.job_id = p.job_id and m.employee_num = t.employee_num and t.conf_num = c.conf_num and d.dept_id = #{param1} order by m.job_id

select d.dept_id, d.dept_name, round(avg(t.process),2) aver from conf_topic t, e_member m, e_dept d where m.employee_num = t.employee_num and m.dept_id = d.dept_id group by d.dept_id, d.dept_name order by aver desc
